title: 6. Your company processes high volumes of IoT data that are time-stamped. The total data volume can be several petabytes. The data needs to be written and changed at a high speed. You want to use the most performant storage option for your data. Which product should you use?
answer: Answer: C is correct because Cloud Bigtable is the most performant storage option to work with IoT and time series data. - https://cloud.google.com/bigtable/docs/schema-design-time-series
